title: Inspiration island
description: Visit Inspiration Island, a floating theme park world filled with creative challenges. Whether you are new to Creative Mode or just need a little extra inspiration, a visit here sets you on the path to craft your own groundbreaking worlds!

title: International space station
description: Did you know that humans have been living in space for almost 20 years? Minecraft is celebrating this historic milestone in partnership with NASA with a new International Space Station world for you to explore.

title: Blockheads
description: These crazy skins have blocks and mobs for heads! Carry around a cute lil creeper, explosive TNT, or wear a slime on your head like a hat! What's in the '?' block you carry around?

title: Farm life
description: Welcome to Farm Life. Experience the challenging life of a farmer. Tend your fields, trade your harvest for better farming equipment, produce food, and become the best farmer in the world!
